about_the_game:
Football Referee Simulator—the groundbreaking game that puts you in the referee's shoes! Are you ready to kickstart your career in the lower divisions and ascend to legendary status by overseeing thrilling finals?

Experience Real-Time Game Simulation!

Step onto the pitch and play a pivotal role in the game's outcome! With real-time simulation, every decision you make holds the power to shape the course of the match!

Craft Your Journey and Elevate Your Character!

Shape your own persona and chase after your goals! Stay updated with post-game news, claim prestigious awards, and elevate your personal stats!

Explore a Vast Football Universe!

Immerse yourself in a world featuring over 100 diverse clubs, 16 national teams, and a multitude of leagues and tournaments waiting to be conquered.

No ads. No in-game purchases. All content is unlocked upon purchase. Football Referee Simulator offers seamless gameplay without interruptions.

Localized in 11 languages—English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Turkish, Indonesian, Polish, Greek, and Russian—immerse yourself in the game in your preferred language!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
